titleStmt.title: Brittain's Ida. Written by that renowned poët, Edmond Spencer
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Phineas, 1582-1650.
Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599, attributed name.
Fletcher, Giles, 1588?-1623, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Child in Brittaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Edmund Spenser, but by Phineas Fletcher. Also sometimes attributed to Giles Fletcher the younger.
Identified as STC 11057 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
